content: cute **nordic christmas tree amigurumi** for making christmas tree ornaments festive garlands for the holidays gift tags keychains etc *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** aran 4 medium yarn 3 5 mm e/4 us 9 uk crochet hook tapestry needle cotton stuffing for amigurumi *optional * a piece of cord one small wooden bead **yarn & yardage** for each tree i used ~ 16 5 yds 15 m of paintbox yarns simply aran 201 yds / 184 m 100 g or stylecraft special aran 214 yds / 196 m 100 g **gauge & size** this pattern is too small to determine the gauge the size of the finished tree is approximately 2 5 6 5 cm by 2 5 cm at the largest point at the base **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
